definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: The government furnished the scientific expedition with the necessary equipment.
sentences.chinese: 政府提供给科学考察队以必要的装备。

sentences.english: The costs of the expeditions are significant.
sentences.chinese: 考察队的花费是有意义的。

sentences.english: The expeditioners looked for water in the vast desert.
sentences.chinese: 考察队员在浩瀚的沙漠中寻找水源。

sentences.english: The team hopes to be the first to sample a sub-glacial Antarctic lake.
sentences.chinese: 考察队希望能第一个获取南极冰川下的湖泊样本。

sentences.english: We must fit the expedition out with the best equipment.
sentences.chinese: 政府提供给科学考察队以必要的装备。

sentences.english: Of course, I think that the Catlin Arctic explorers are truly remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我认为卡特林北极考察队的确是了不起的。

sentences.english: President Vladimir V. Putin called the members of the expedition to thank them personally.
sentences.chinese: 普京总统给考察队致电并对他们表示由衷的感谢。

sentences.english: The Antarctic explorers shouted with joy when they came in sight of land.
sentences.chinese: 当南极考察队员们看到了陆地时，他们欢呼起来。

definition: Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
